message: I'm offering you a small share, but it's better than nothing! We can negotiate further if you prefer.
I'm trying to be fair, but I'm not willing to give up too much. Your turn to make a better offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get more than this. Let's try to find a more equitable split.
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I still think I should get a slightly larger share. Your turn again!
I'm making a concession, but this is my final offer.  I'm not willing to take any less with so little time left.
I think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to give up my chance at a bigger share. I'll give you a 50/50 split, but I'm not going any higher.
